Doctor.overview: Experience a typical day as a family doctor treating patients, managing emergencies, and maintaining medical records.

daily_schedule.task: Review patient charts and prepare for the day
daily_schedule.description: Check overnight messages, review scheduled appointments, and prepare treatment plans.
Visit hospitalized patients, check progress, adjust medications, and coordinate with specialists.
See 6-8 patients: routine checkups, diagnose symptoms, prescribe treatments.
Urgent case: assess symptoms, order ECG, coordinate with cardiologist, manage patient anxiety.
Update patient files, write prescriptions, complete insurance forms, review lab results.
Continue seeing scheduled patients: chronic disease management, preventive care, minor procedures.
Quick lunch while reviewing afternoon schedule and returning urgent calls.
See remaining patients, handle walk-ins, manage complex cases requiring longer consultation.
Complete paperwork, return patient calls, coordinate referrals, update treatment plans.
Brief on-call doctor, review critical patients, ensure emergency protocols are ready.

Doctor.work_life_balance: Challenging - long hours and on-call duties

global.work_culture: Varies by country - US/UK have longer hours

india.work_culture: Often includes private practice alongside hospital work

Game Developer.overview: Experience the creative and technical challenges of developing video games, from coding gameplay mechanics to debugging complex systems.

working_hours.crunch_time: Up to 12-14 hours during release periods

daily_schedule.description: Team sync: discuss yesterday's progress, today's goals, and any blockers with designers and artists.
Review teammates' code, plan implementation of new game features, check version control updates.
Write C# code for character controller, handle physics interactions, test different movement speeds.
Lunch break often includes playing games with team for inspiration and bonding.
Investigate why players are falling through platforms, test edge cases, fix physics bugs.
Discuss gameplay mechanics, review design documents, provide technical feasibility feedback.
Code inventory system, health bars, menu navigation, integrate with art assets.
Test latest build, identify bugs, gather feedback, document issues for tomorrow.
Work on indie game side project, experiment with new technologies, build portfolio.

Game Developer.work_life_balance: Good normally, challenging during crunch periods
Game Developer.education_required: Computer Science degree or equivalent experience

global.work_culture: Casual environment, flexible hours, but crunch periods common

india.work_culture: Growing industry with both international and local game studios

IAS Officer.overview: Experience the responsibilities of a senior civil servant managing government policies, public welfare programs, and administrative decisions.

daily_schedule.description: Check district reports, emergency situations, media coverage, and priority issues requiring immediate attention.
Coordinate with police, health, education, and revenue departments on ongoing projects and issues.
Meet citizens with complaints, land disputes, welfare scheme issues, listen and provide solutions.
Working lunch with local leaders, MLAs, or senior officials to discuss ongoing issues.
Visit villages to inspect road construction, school building, water supply projects, interact with beneficiaries.
Review policy proposals, sign important files, approve budgets, coordinate with state government.
Coordinate disaster response, deploy rescue teams, arrange relief materials, brief media.
Calls with state secretariat, plan tomorrow's schedule, review pending issues.

rewards: Direct impact on society and governance
IAS Officer.work_life_balance: Challenging - irregular hours and high responsibility
IAS Officer.education_required: Graduate degree + UPSC Civil Services Exam

Software Engineer.overview: Experience the daily life of a software engineer building web applications, solving technical problems, and collaborating with cross-functional teams.

daily_schedule.description: Review overnight messages, join team standup to discuss progress and blockers.
Review teammates' pull requests, plan today's development tasks, check project timeline.
Write backend API for login/signup, implement JWT tokens, add password validation, write unit tests.
Lunch with colleagues, sometimes walking meetings or casual discussions about tech trends.
Investigate user-reported bug, analyze logs, identify root cause, deploy hotfix to production.
Build responsive UI components, integrate with backend APIs, ensure cross-browser compatibility.
Sprint planning meeting, update technical documentation, discuss architecture decisions.
Learn new framework, contribute to open source, work on side projects, read tech blogs.

Software Engineer.work_life_balance: Good - flexible hours and remote work options

global.work_culture: Flexible, collaborative, emphasis on work-life balance

india.work_culture: Growing tech ecosystem, increasing focus on employee well-being

Teacher.overview: Experience the rewarding yet challenging life of an educator, shaping young minds while managing classroom dynamics and administrative responsibilities.

daily_schedule.task: Prepare classroom and review lesson plans
daily_schedule.description: Set up materials, review today's lessons, check for any last-minute changes or announcements.
Teach quadratic equations, manage 28 students, handle disruptions, ensure everyone understands.
Explain triangle proofs, use visual aids, help struggling students, maintain classroom discipline.
Grade assignments, prepare materials for next class, respond to parent emails, make copies.
Advanced students, teach trigonometric functions, encourage questions, prepare for AP exams.
Work with struggling students, different learning styles, build confidence, individual attention.
Quick lunch while supervising cafeteria, handle student conflicts, brief break from teaching.
Teach probability concepts, use real-world examples, engage students with data analysis projects.
Monitor students doing homework, provide help when needed, maintain quiet environment.
Help students who are falling behind, prepare for tests, one-on-one instruction.
Update gradebook, plan tomorrow's lessons, attend department meeting, parent communication.

Teacher.work_life_balance: Moderate - good holidays but evening work required

global.work_culture: Varies by country - Finland has high respect, US faces challenges

india.work_culture: Traditional respect for teachers, but increasing pressure for results

Data Scientist.overview: Experience the analytical world of data science, extracting insights from complex datasets and building predictive models.

daily_schedule.task: Check emails and review project status
daily_schedule.description: Review overnight model runs, check for any data pipeline issues, plan the day's work.
Analyze new dataset, identify missing values, outliers, and data quality issues using Python/R.
Sync with engineering team, discuss model deployment, share findings with stakeholders.
Create new features, test different algorithms, tune hyperparameters, validate model performance.
Lunch while reading research papers or discussing ideas with colleagues.
Run A/B tests, perform statistical significance tests, analyze experiment results.
Build dashboards, create charts, prepare presentation for business stakeholders.
Read latest research papers, learn new techniques, contribute to open source projects.

Data Scientist.work_life_balance: Good - flexible hours and remote work options

india.work_culture: Growing field with increasing demand in tech companies

DevOps Engineer.overview: Experience the fast-paced world of DevOps, managing cloud infrastructure, automating deployments, and ensuring system reliability.

daily_schedule.task: Check system alerts and overnight deployments
daily_schedule.description: Review monitoring dashboards, check for any production issues, analyze deployment logs.
Write Terraform scripts, update Kubernetes configurations, automate CI/CD pipelines.
Critical server outage - diagnose issue, coordinate with teams, implement fix, post-mortem.
Quick lunch while monitoring alerts, sometimes working lunch during incidents.
Optimize AWS/Azure costs, scale resources, implement security best practices.
Sprint planning, architecture discussions, knowledge sharing with development teams.
Configure Prometheus, set up Grafana dashboards, fine-tune alert thresholds.

DevOps Engineer.work_life_balance: Challenging - on-call duties but flexible hours
DevOps Engineer.education_required: Computer Science degree or equivalent experience

india.work_culture: Growing DevOps adoption in Indian tech companies

Cybersecurity Analyst.overview: Protect organizations from cyber threats through monitoring, analysis, and incident response in an increasingly dangerous digital landscape.

daily_schedule.description: Review overnight security events, threat intelligence updates, ongoing investigations.
Analyze suspicious network traffic, investigate potential malware, hunt for advanced threats.
Major ransomware attack detected - isolate systems, analyze impact, coordinate response team.
Scan systems for vulnerabilities, prioritize patches, work with IT teams on remediation.
Quick lunch while monitoring critical alerts, staying available for emergencies.
Conduct phishing simulation, train employees on security best practices.
Update security policies, prepare compliance reports, document incident responses.
Research new attack vectors, update security tools, analyze threat actor tactics.

Cybersecurity Analyst.work_life_balance: Challenging - high stress and on-call requirements

india.work_culture: Growing cybersecurity awareness, increasing investment in security

UX/UI Designer.overview: Create intuitive and beautiful digital experiences by researching user needs and designing interfaces that delight users.

working_hours.flexible: Flexible hours and remote work options

daily_schedule.description: Sync with design team, review project timelines, discuss design challenges.
Analyze user interviews, create user personas, map user journeys and pain points.
Create wireframes in Figma, build interactive prototypes, iterate on design concepts.
Lunch while browsing design inspiration, visiting design galleries, creative recharge.
Present designs to stakeholders, receive feedback, defend design decisions, iterate.
Create high-fidelity mockups, design system components, ensure brand consistency.
Prepare design specs for developers, update design system, document interactions.

stress_factors: Balancing user needs vs business goals
UX/UI Designer.work_life_balance: Good - creative environment with flexible hours

india.work_culture: Growing design awareness in Indian startups and tech companies

Digital Marketing Manager.overview: Drive business growth through digital channels, managing campaigns, analyzing data, and optimizing customer acquisition strategies.

working_hours.flexible: Some evening work for campaign monitoring

daily_schedule.description: Analyze overnight campaign performance, check Google Ads, Facebook metrics, ROI analysis.
Plan social media content, write blog posts, create email campaigns, coordinate with designers.
Configure email sequences, set up lead nurturing workflows, A/B test campaigns.
Lunch while checking industry news, networking with other marketers, learning new trends.
Optimize Google Ads campaigns, adjust Facebook targeting, manage budget allocation, crisis management.
Create performance dashboards, analyze conversion funnels, prepare executive reports.
Research competitors, plan next quarter campaigns, explore new marketing channels.

Digital Marketing Manager.education_required: Marketing degree or digital marketing certifications

india.work_culture: Rapidly growing digital marketing ecosystem in India

Chartered Accountant.overview: Manage financial reporting, taxation, auditing, and business advisory services as one of India's most prestigious professional careers.

daily_schedule.description: Meet with business clients, discuss financial strategies, tax planning, compliance issues.
Prepare balance sheets, P&L statements, cash flow statements, ensure accuracy and compliance.
Quick lunch while reviewing client files, sometimes working lunch during busy season.

daily_schedule.task: Tax return filing and GST compliance
daily_schedule.description: Prepare income tax returns, GST filings, handle tax notices, ensure regulatory compliance.
Conduct statutory audits, internal audits, verify financial records, test internal controls.
Provide business advice, financial planning, investment guidance, strategic consulting.
Study new regulations, attend CPE programs, research industry trends.

stress_factors: Long working hours during busy season
Chartered Accountant.work_life_balance: Challenging - long hours especially during peak seasons

india.work_culture: Traditional professional practice with high respect and responsibility

Civil Services Officer (IPS).overview: Maintain law and order, investigate crimes, and ensure public safety as a senior police officer in India's premier police service.

daily_schedule.description: Review overnight incidents, crime reports, security briefings, plan day's operations.
Visit police stations, inspect security arrangements, interact with ground staff.
Supervise major crime investigations, coordinate with forensics, guide investigation teams.
Meet with senior officials, handle administrative matters, policy implementation.
Address public complaints, appear in court for cases, interact with legal system.
Handle communal tension, deploy forces, coordinate with administration, ensure peace.
Review day's operations, plan security for events, coordinate with intelligence.

stress_factors: Balancing law enforcement with human rights
Civil Services Officer (IPS).work_life_balance: Very challenging - irregular hours and high responsibility
Civil Services Officer (IPS).education_required: Graduate degree + UPSC Civil Services Exam

india.work_culture: Hierarchical, disciplined, high public accountability and responsibility

Investment Banker.overview: Facilitate major financial transactions, mergers, acquisitions, and capital raising for corporations in high-stakes financial markets.

daily_schedule.description: Review overnight market movements, analyze sector trends, prepare morning briefings.
Create pitch decks, financial models, valuation analysis for potential M&A deals.
Present to C-suite executives, discuss deal structures, negotiate terms.
Analyze target companies, review financial statements, assess risks and synergies.
Coordinate with lawyers, prepare transaction documents, manage deal timeline.
Team dinner while discussing deal progress, coordinate with global offices.
Build complex financial models, sensitivity analysis, scenario planning.

Investment Banker.work_life_balance: Very poor - extremely long hours and high pressure
Investment Banker.education_required: Top MBA or Finance degree + CFA preferred

india.work_culture: Growing investment banking sector with international standards

Renewable Energy Engineer.overview: Design and implement sustainable energy solutions, working on solar, wind, and other renewable energy projects to combat climate change.

daily_schedule.description: Review solar farm designs, wind turbine layouts, energy yield calculations, site assessments.
Travel to wind farm site, inspect turbine performance, coordinate with maintenance teams.
Lunch at project site or office, often discussing technical challenges with team.
Use software to model energy production, optimize system design, analyze performance data.
Work on environmental permits, grid connection approvals, safety compliance documentation.
Present project proposals to clients, discuss technical specifications, cost-benefit analysis.
Research new technologies, attend webinars, study latest renewable energy innovations.

Renewable Energy Engineer.work_life_balance: Good - meaningful work with reasonable hours

india.work_culture: Rapidly growing renewable energy sector with government support

Content Creator/Influencer.overview: Create engaging digital content across platforms, build audience communities, and monetize through sponsorships and brand partnerships.

working_hours.weekend_work: Content creation often extends to weekends

daily_schedule.description: Plan content calendar, research trending topics, brainstorm creative ideas for posts.
Film videos, take photos, create graphics, set up lighting and equipment.
Lunch while responding to comments, engaging with followers, networking with other creators.
Edit videos, enhance photos, create thumbnails, add captions and effects.
Negotiate sponsorship deals, create branded content, manage business partnerships.
Analyze content performance, track engagement metrics, optimize posting strategies.
Respond to DMs, engage with audience, moderate comments, build community.

Content Creator/Influencer.work_life_balance: Flexible but blurred boundaries between work and personal life
Content Creator/Influencer.education_required: No formal requirements - portfolio and audience matter most

india.work_culture: Growing creator economy with increasing brand investment

stress_scale.5: Very High - Crisis mode, intense pressure
